div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1828 Tali-Murdapatou, near Bukhara, Uzbekistan (anc. Sogdiana), 1938 Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (M) Contents: 78+ AR Sogdian imit. of Euthydemus I, Bactria: tetradr. Disposition: unknown Masson, Sbornik Studencheskikh rabot Srednea- ziatskogo Gosudarstvennogo Universiteta 3 (Tashkent, 1951), p. 68
